content.detailedDescription:
Around 7:15 pm on nov. 11, 2010 on north west side of san antonio, i had just returned from the store for a last minute item i needed for dinner.  i was alone and in a hurry because my daughter and her boyfriend were coming for dinner in about 45 minutes.
i arrived at my apt. which is on the 3rd floor and immediately started heating oil in a pan for chinese food.  i then stepped outside onto the balcony for a quick cigg. when i immediately noticed a boomerang object that was solid red not very large, very slowly traveling east to west out in front of me approx. 6-8 hundred yards away moving silently. very slow. it really looked like boomerang because when it kinda tilted you could see the shape although it was dark but not pitch black out. 
note: i have been watching the sky at dusk and night every day since my daughter told me to look up el paso incident. and, i have seen a few strange things which i'll mention later.
anyway, three white objects, shere like appeared, i didn't see where they came from as i was watching the boomerang,they had solid white lights-non flashing, silent and they kinda flew in a triangular pattern right there in front of me about 400 yards away. they would move closer together and then apart 2 kinda together and one lower below at maybe 10 yards from the other two. they would just stop and hover, not moving, and then start again, moving around.
i then looking out at the sky for anything else, saw two helicopters in the distance, one coming from the east and the other from the north, coming towards my location. 
suddenly, other objects just started appearing in front of me, nothing and then a flash of light one was flash of red and then it was there and just appeared, they were appearing from different parts of the sky, which was still clear as i could see the stars above the objects. these new objects looked kinda roundish would flash different colored lights, red, green, white with no patterns to them flash and then nothing go blank then turn back on. they were slowly moving around in the sky, some would move toward each other as if to collide but veer away from each other, maybe 8 things there in the sky.
the helicopters were coming closer, but moving futher north -west of where the red boomerang object was, as the helicopters came closer angling in as if corraling, but not close to it, they all three flew beyond my line of sight due to the apt. complex on the right.
the other pulsing-flashing objects were still there just kinda dancing around some appeared kinda, not transparent but light, i dont know how to describe them. 
then from the west, from behind the west apt. ccomplex appeared something that had 6 smallish solid white lights, it came into view from west going very slowly east but only short distance beyond apt. complex and then it just started in opposite direction without turning. it was coming maybe 10 yards beyond complex and then just reversed itself, so i never saw the other side of it but it was the largest object out there the whole time this occurred.
i was at that point scared but amazed at what i was seeing, i wished someone else was with me to bear witness to what was happening.I wished i had a camera or video camera with me but they are packed in storage as i recently moved here to sa. i wish i could describe better what was occuring before my eyes, but it was so strange to see.
to understand my line of sight, as i said, i'm on the third floor, immediately to my right as i face north, there is a apt. complex. otherwise, my view is open as far as the horizon to the north and a good amount of the east.
i could see in the distance other helicopters heading towards my direction from afar, from the east and from over the apt. complex to the west.
note sa airport is to the west of me but i don't know how far away exactly. so i hear and see planes coming in and departing all day and night. there was no air plane traffic going on during this.  only helicopters could be seen except for the strange objects still out there in front of me.
these objects were not planes, nothing moves like they were moving that i am aware of. its hard to explain it and as it was happening for approx. 10 minutes, i had already ran in the apt. to turn off the oil, the lights-objects were still flying around very strange like, circling each other darting here and there, some would "turn off" suddenly disappearing and reappear- very odd.Some of them looked kinda clear w- no lights on some pulsing red, white, green as i said no patterns to lights flashing.
as the helicopters came closer they started leaving
 some kinda drifting away slowly, others just rapidly headed out towards the east- futher east than the copter coming in, some just blinked out and i couldn't see  them.
i decided i wanted to see what was happening from the front of the apt. complex which is facing north but i thought i might be able to see futher west to see what was going on, i ran-quickly walked down three flights stairs and made my way to the front of the complex, i really couldn't see anything so i headed back upstairs to the balcony{i had already lit another cigg. before i decided to go downstairs and it was still lit when i returned}igrabbed my phone on the way in and took pic but it didn't come out. 
some, maybe 3-4 objects were still out there, they didn't appear to be in hurry, i couldn't see the helicopters but could hear them somewhere.
during this time frame, maybe 15 minutes, i watched them a few minutes, buzzing around when helicopter came in from above me, the remaining objects just left in different directions.
i called my daughter and told her what had been happening and told her to look out to see if she could see anything.. but she didn't.  she said she was on her way and wished she had been here to see. 
i kept watching the sky and didn't see anything but helicopters circling in the distance towards the front of me and out of sight to the west and east. i did hear, i think two large air craft flying over but didn't see them. i saw one large, maybe jet, flying relatively slowly for them go overhead maybe 10 minutes later i guess. i didn't see any of the regular air craft flying but the helicopters would come into sight maybe 5 of them.
i did go inside and grabbed my laptop and looked up the ufo report site and called a cell # that was listed ( 360-591-1481] and left brief message as to what had occured with my call back #.
my daughter and her bf arrived and i told them kinda what had happened but i was kinda freaked out about the whole thing.
of course, they were starving and i hadn't finished dinner so i went inside and prepared dinner for approx.40 minutes but i felt pretty disorganized and it isn't the way i normally am, i would get goosebumps on my arms when i thought about what had happened.
the whole time i made dinner, i kept the balcony door open, with the a/c running just to see or hear anything fly over and would look out the door every once in a while. nothing except the copters.
so, what did i see? i don't know. when my daughter and her bf left, i sat out side for a while but didn't see anything else. i did check sa airport for arrivals and departures and all where on time. they didn't come in from this direction that i could see the whole time maybe 2 hrs had passed. 
i checked before i went to bed and this morning and nothing was reported. do you have any information as to what happened last night?
i am a, relatively, normal person, married 25 years with two children at utsa.
at the beginning of this report, i stated that i had seen a few strange things: i saw a few weeks ago a blue light flying toward me from the north, it really scared me as i thought it was a ufo, i even told my daughter that it was coming and to come see. as it came closer i could hear it was a helicopter but its front light was blue, as it passed directly overhead, flying really low, i could see it was a black helicopter with a strange flat looking tail.
another time, maybe 2 1/2 weeks ago saw a brillant white- strobe light object off to the east flying rapidly away, but i could see that brillant white strobe like light for a long time until it left out of sight.
my husband and i recently discussed ufos and he said if you really saw one there would be no doubt in our mind because he once was strange white light while driving south on i-35 towards laredo. i kinda teased him about it because i guess seeing is believing....
so, if you know anything about what happened last night please let me know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 1st red boomerang, 3 white non pulsing sphere, others flashing red, white, green solid-transparentish

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime between 9:30 and 9:40pm last night (11/11/10), i went outside to have a cigarette.  to be clear, i had not been drinking alcohol, taking medication, or consuming anything that may impair my my judgment.  

my apartment balcony is on the top floor (3 stories) and faces north.  there were light, misty clouds directly to my north (w/ intermittent stars visible through them) and clear skies to my east.  it was not until about 30 seconds to 1 minute after i had stepped outside that i saw the lights.  they did not approach as a plane would from the far corner of my vantage point.  instead, the object seemed to glide down from the cloud cover to my nw and traveled straight east.  i am not a certified expert, but studying aircraft has always been a hobby of mine.  i have also seen most types of aircraft in action (fighter jets, helicopters, even a b2 bomber).  

the instant i saw this aircraft, i knew right away that this was something that i had never seen or even read about (barring speculative aircraft from books, tv shows, etc.)  the limited cloud cover that was there was very low (i estimate at around 1,000 - 1,500 ft.)  the object was also very close (probably not more than a half mile from me).  

as i stated previously, it was shaped similar to an arrowhead and the angle of it was somewhat sharp.  it was certainly not the shape of any conventional aircraft in regard to a discernible fuselage with fixed wings.  the entire bottom of the aircraft was lined with medium sized, round, white lights.  the lights were not overly bright, but bright enough as to where i could vaguely make out the profile of the top of the craft as well, which had a very low profile.  the color appeared to be a dull metallic gray - it did not appear to give off any type of shine.

if i had to estimate the size of the craft, i would probably compare it to a medium sized fighter jet.  it moved very fluidly (seemed to gently weave back and forth as it flew) and did not make the even the slightest sound.  as it flew, it seemed to hug the cloud line.  i would estimate the speed to be at around 200mph +/-, but i would leave the final determination to someone more qualified than myself.  it traveled nearly straight east until it got to the ne portion of my vantage point.  at that time it made a slight angle up into the thin clouds and very soon after, turned to the ne and very quickly accelerated and departed at sharper vertically than 45 degrees and disappeared.  

when it departed, it was almost to the edge of the thin cloud mass in front of me.  if it was flying at any angle less than 45 degrees, it would have come out of the cloud cover in very short order.  i watched for an additional five minutes or so, and it never came out.  based on how thin the cloud cover was, i also should have been able to at least catch glimpses of it if it indeed did travel almost vertically.  

though the entire event literally lasted only about 10 seconds, i want to reiterate that this was not some distant object.  i saw it very closely, clearly and definitely.  

i am only agreeing to file this report after speaking to the mn chapter director on the phone today due to the fact that i do not wish to share this information only to have it posted out on the internet or to attract any unnecessary attention.  i am merely interested in reporting what it is i saw in the hopes of hopefully getting a better idea of what it was and what it wasn't.  i am also very curious to know if anyone else saw anything similar to what i did last night.  i do not claim to know what this object was, but i got a good enough look and was more than close enough to it to definitely know what it was not.  while a bit confused and a little unsure about the entire process, i am looking forward to speaking with an investigator and learning more.  if after speaking, it is determined to be helpful that a third party is contacted, i will be open to that.  but i explicitly request that my information is shared only with an appointed investigator until that time.
content.summary: Shaped like arrow-head w/ medium sized round lights outlining the bottom of the object, completely silent/very maneverable

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette when i looked up and saw from the right what at first appeared to be a ball. as it went across my field of view it became apparant that it was a cylindrical object. i thought it was a plane, but the more i looked, the more bizarre it seemed to look. it looked exactly like a plane, without any markings or logos, silver in color, without any wings or tail. i struggled to keep my eyes on it as it was moving steady and fast. as i was keeping my eyes on it in disbelief, i noticed a jet with vapor trail at a much higer elevation following it's same path, maybe 4 seconds later a second jet, same vapor trail same path. i dont know if these were related, but they were there and i assure you they could definitely see the object as well. the plane without wings was much much lower in altitude, yet it was moving much faster. i had a very wide view of the sky, and it is a crystal clear blue sky. this object took about 6 seconds to go all the way across the sky, while the jets took seemingly 4 or 5 times as long. i live right by dulles airport, so i see planes all the time. i also have a pretty good idea of flight paths around or above my home as i see the planes departing in generally the same area and path and the planes arriving which is a totally other path on the other side of the sky and different direction. i have observed many ,many many planes here over the years, my favorites are when they are flying very low because you can actually get a very very detailed look at them as they pass overhead.  what i saw just now was no plane. the sun was glinting off of it, i had basically 3 different angled views of it, as it approached, flew almost directly over me, and as it left. i had a very clear view of this thing. it had no wings!! it looked like a fusellage(sp?) but with no tail, no fins, no wings, no markings. i didnt even see really any windows or a cockpit windshield. the best way i can describe it is a jetliner with no wings or markings or tail mechanism. it was truly strange! i can say with utmost certainty that it was not a plane of any kind. it did not exhibit any strange flight characteristics other then it seemed to be going very very fast. i had probably a 180 panoramic view of the sky and it took this thing about 7 seconds or so to come into view and go all the way across the sky. it seemed maybe 4 times as fast as a normal jet you would see flying across the sky. i also dont think i heard any sound coming from it, and when i normally see planes at around the same appearance of altitude you can definitely hear them! i made sure to wrap my eyes around it and assess if maybe light was making the wings not visible, but this was not the case. if this thing had wings or a tail i would have beenable to see them! the jets which were at much much higher altitude were clearly visible to have wings and a general plane shape.  this thing was not a plane!!! in broad daylight no less! ive never seen anything like it! i hope someone else saw it.
content.summary: Plane without wings, escorted by 2 jets

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside walking across the yard.I noticed a very bright light in the sky almost directly overhead.It was moving faster than an aircraft.It was totally silent,never making a sound.The light was steady until it was halfway across the sky at which point it suddenly dimmed to red.At this point it simply vanished as if a light switch was turned off.There was never any contrail from the object.There was nothing in view to gage size,but i got the impression the object was large.
i hold masters degree's in physics and aeronautical  engineering and can state that this object is nothing i am familiar with.It did not behave as one would expect of an aircraft known to our science.
content.summary: Ufo crossed sky and just vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back patio of the evening dated above at approx 11:30 pm (0330 utc), and observed an unnormal star in the sky located approx. 60 degrees nne at an elevation of approx 20-25 degrees.  i noticed this because at this time a normal star rise occurs and this star-like object was not normal.  the object was not a star after observation, due to the steady emmited light from the object. the object was at the same elevation but approx 10-15 degrees to the north of the normal star. after about 30 seconds the object accelerated at an unnormal rate toward the normal star, and then stopped instantly about 5-7 degrees from the original star, stayed in place for approx. 10 seconds then accelerated at unnormal speed, to the eye, next to the original star; stopped and stayed in that place for over a minute. the object then seemed to accelerate away at a high rate of speed and disappeared from sight in an instant.  this was very unique, and certainly did not seem normal.  the rate of acceleration was extreme, and to my knowledge there is no commercial jet, or military aircraft that can do what this object did.
content.summary: Observed a star-like object in the nne sky accelerate at high speed, stop, accelerate and stop then spped off from view

content.detailedDescription: I was at recess once and looked up to see what the weather was like and saw a small white object. i was suprised to see it. then two other ufos approcached the object. they seemed to dance together. then made a maneuver that no other plane could do. it made a 90 degree turn without slowing down. during this time it was in triangular formation. to end the event it flew into a cloud bank
content.summary: 3 disc shaped ufos flyling in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were walking around a local park and after some time we decided to sit on a bench where we noticed the beautiful night sky. as we stared up to the sky we saw a shooting star, as the night progressed i kept an eye out for more shooting stars and once it came time for my friend to leave as i hugged her goodbye i saw what appeared to me to be space debris though im unsure since it was the first time i ever seen anything like it. 

first falling with a bright white to blue, yellow-orange then red color until no longer visible but a few minutes later as i began to walk home i kept my eyes on the sky staring up as i walked and noticed a star like shine that moved across the sky in a short zig zag sort of motion but kept a steady speed. faster than the planes i could visibly see and this what i believe to be a ufo was at a far greater altitude than the planes i could see flying above.

 as i watched this ufo i had a great sense of euphoria wash over me to an extent where i actually shed a tear from an intense sense of happiness and when it just vanished i knew what i saw because planes and stars do not just disappear in the blink of an eye. i hope to one day see it again and experience this moment again.
content.summary: Zig zagging star(ufo)

content.detailedDescription: This is the most spectacular event i've ever heard of, it should've been seen by most of the dc area but i never heard anything from the media. this was my second sighting, the first being in the 60s with my uncle and cousin. i was working outside this time. it was a beautiful fall afternoon with no clouds or wind. perfect for them in their process to tell us something. i was working for a construction co., driving around outside the district, maintaining heavy equipment and refueling it. we got to the ge headquarters job site got out and as i refueled something i looked up, i'm very observant, and there they were, plain as day. they were abreast but not touching and they were writing in the sky!! they were moving slowly, too slow for anything to be doing what they were doing. they were linked up it seemed to act as one. they pivoted in perfect unison as we did as sailor recruits, marching and turning, the inside guy goes slower etc. about every 30 seconds, they would again with total precision, put out a puff of smoke or something that stayed right where they put them to form letters, they had about 4 letters done and still going, it must've taken them half an hour to get to where i came in.It was totally obvious and appeared to be made to face the center of the district, i'd guess close to a mile up and a mile or so away, giant letters made of dots, hanging in the area. no human made objects could have ever done it. it seemed like i was seeing it from behind and it was angled towards the district from my view. i could make out the letters but not the word, it was backwards or they were spelling in reverse order. i watched for the time we were at that site, about 15 to 20 minutes, then my coworker/boss wanted to split. he knew what i was seeing but didn't want to look, i think he was worried about ridicule or something. even as we were pulling away i could still see it through the bare trees. millions had to have seen it. my girlfriend says they decide who can see them but i don't really buy that. my coworker said he saw "something" but he wasn't sure what. even out the corner of his eyes he saw something, it was that big and obvious. i realize of course that our govt. would never dream of hiding anything from the public and i'm sure they know nothing about the 2 fighters pursuing the first one i saw.
content.summary: 5 or 6 ufo's like little bright lights, linked up but not together, moving very slow.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home after dropping my daughter off at dance class at 10:30 am on 10/27/10 in colleyville tx  driving from southlake on whites chapel back toward colleyville  i noticed a blinding bright round object  dropping like a plane nosediving.  i could not tell what it was but just asumed it was a plan nose diving and the sun was hitting it  like when you hold foil up to the sun.  realized that did not make sense after recalling memories of other planes and them never looking like this object.  it moved fast, i remember thinking i am so worried that plane looks like it is in trouble since it appeared to be falling straight down. it suddenly made a left (my right) when  i went through some tree and lost it.  got home and continued to look up but never saw anything else!?? totally clear skies and sunny great day???
content.summary: Blinding sphere

content.detailedDescription:
In december 2006, three men went missing on mt. hood. cnn was reporting live on the rescue operation taking place at the summit. all three men where found dead. the united states military sent in a u.S. army chinook helicopter to assist in the evacuation of rescue teams on the mountain.

this part of the operation was being broadcast live by cnn at the time. as i was watching the live broadcast, cnn camera crews zoomed in on the chinook helicopter as the pilot was preparing to start rescue lift operation. 

as i was watching this event take place, i noticed a disk shaped object moving from left to right at a very high rate of speed.  the object traveled from behind the mountain on the left side of the screen, to the right and moved behind the helicopter and out of view.

i would suspect that cnn still retains the video footage of this event. i am simply letting you know. what you do with this information is up to you. i prefer to remain anonymous. however, i would like to be notified by email if mufon feels this is a very important find.

as i said, cnn retains this video footage. i have looked online and at youtube for any of this footage. i have been unable to locate the actual video. i am an aviation air combat artist of 25 years as well as a graphic artist. i have put together 2 pictures that are very close to the original video i saw that day. the angle of the aircraft, mountain and object are very close too the original footage. this should give you a good guide to assist in your search. "please do not mistake these pictures for the real thing".
content.summary: Disk shaped object moving at high speed from left to right.

content.detailedDescription:
The craft was heading north by north west.  looked to be traveling along the 101 up the coast. or maybe on the coast line itself.  i was in milpitas making a delivery and finished at 3:58 am. saw out of my eye what i thought was a flock of geece or birds climbing back into my commercial truck.  after rubbing my eyes and realizing what i was seeing i climbed onto the top of my truck to watch it.  the craft in relation to where it was in the sky, was the size of a 50 cent piece, and was in the general placement just below orion's belt constelation. at the point i saw it- it "appeared" to be leaving the san jose area.  

the point of the " v " was pointing north and i was able to see the lights clearly around both sides. the sky was very clear with a new moon.  unlike the drawings i have seen on ufo hunters the lights were individual about 5-7 , not one solid light. there was also a kind of glow around them appearing to be one solid light. i watched it for about 3-4 min until the craft faded into the night.  it was clearly a craft as the stars disappeared as the craft went under them. it looked to be moving at a slow pace. but up that high who knows. 

it was my first sighting and was really cool.  i hope i was able to add to your list on mufon.  

i can now understand why photo's of ufo's look fuzy in nature- if i had used my camera on my phone it would have looked fuzy as well. 

if these are military like some believe its important to know just days ago there was a mysterious missile launched off our southern coast down by san diego.
content.summary: Triangle heading north up coast of ca

content.detailedDescription:
Their were lights in the sky occasionally but the events we experienced were telepathic in nature and involved contact with a person we believe to be from a parallel earth via a machine with a machine brain interface, i documented the entire years experiences each time we entered the valley up until my sister made contact with the person / entity who called himself kahalt.  we both have a history of sightings and of strange occurrences over the last couple decades but nothing like this,ironically my sister relayed one of her earlier experiences to kahalt as a possible explanation for her sensitivity to his machine.

what happened was my sister and i would get sick in death valley national park when we would go down there, we would get nausea , dizziness, and depersonalization the difference being that my sister began mumbling in strange languages and would often come out of the confused state and describe visions of all sorts of things like mummies on the salt flat or a stone shack and people in coursly woven robes, one man in particular who was very tall she says maybe seven feet. all the people have long hair about shoulder length and most have black eyes where the iris is black like the pupil of the eye. the tall man appeared over and over in her visions as well as a thing that looked like a stretched out tulip made of brass about 5 feet tall planted in the salt flat like a post with white light coming out the top and red light coming out some triangle shaped openings as if someone had punched them out of the sides with a can opener. eventually she actually saw the tall man in person in a mesquite thicket at the eagle borax works on west side road, both she and he were startled by each other and stood staring, she called out to me and by the time i got there he was gone.
it was a few months later that she felt an urge to drive to badwater where she felt a presence in her mind while sitting on the salt flat eventually she established contact with the presence and could see the tall man's face from the mesquite thicket she said her name and he replied "kahalt" pointing to his chest as she had done in their mental visions of each other. kahalt got very excited and began rambling on in some odd language and the connection was broken, my sister got nauseous and threw up so we left. 
the next weekend we came back and she again contacted kahalt, this time she didn't get as sick and they talked a while, he asked her how she traveled without a machine, she said she thought it was his machine that did it apparently he was referring to the brass tulip. he said he had never seen a traveler like her before her white skin and short hair as well as her brightly colored and odd cloths (shirt and pants verses a robe like his) when she asked how she could hear his thoughts he said the machine "makes my thoughts stronger" his english was very bad but got better each visit apparently thanks to the computer like machine. 
he said he was descended from the people who brought the machine to the parallel death valley she always saw in her visions, apparently they were from a very advanced culture and traveled with one of these things to that place , interbreeding with the natives. eventually the bought the machine there to make it easier to travel to other "places" (kahalt's word) 
when they turned the machine on "before anyone could act" the primitives started dieing on the spot apparently the machines brain interface didn't work right with them and shut down their autonomic system or some such neurological damage was done that they all died. i am not clear on this point weather all the natives died or all except the ones who carried dna from kahalt's home world. kahalt said the people from his home world never went back, eaten by guilt they stayed there and used the machine to help the survivors, kahalt is a descendant of those early people one of only a few whose brain can operate the machine. this was the reason that he said he can't "travel" 
while kahalt never used the words parallel universe or parallel world etc. from the way my sister described her visions the place is almost an exact duplicate of death valley with obvious exceptions such as the lack of any roads or structures save the stone shack. tule spring is a little different and their are human remains about such as the mummies on the salt flat and some bones here and there apparently left over from the holocaust. 

i have kept a journal of the entire experience including every vision with times and dates etc except for some early experiences when we weren't sure what was happening. i have met one other person who said they got sick in the aria of death valley beatty and rhiolite. i myself have experienced "machine sickness" as far north as scotties junction and as far south as shoshone ca. apparently the machine has a kind of field like from a transmitter.

i am quite willing to work with mufon on this and very curious to investigate further but my sister feels the opposite, she is terrified of ending up as a ufo case or "kook" etc, i must respect her wishes and remain anonymous thereby protecting her identity. 
there is more detail but i can't put a years experiences here, contact me if you want to know more.

joe banks
(assumed name)
content.summary: Took place over the corse of  a year or more

content.detailedDescription: I was just out side closing the back garage door and happened to be star watching, like i do a lot then i happened to see it. it was a white dot mixed with the stars but larger.  then turned blue and continued moving at a real slow speed from east to west.  i have a couple still frams and about a minute of video recording.  i have the ( google ) star program and it was not a star on the chart.
content.summary: White circle then blue circle real slow moving no sound

content.detailedDescription: Driving north from victorville, ca. at 7:30pm me and my wife witnessed 24 red lights in the distance near dale evans exit, then drifted slowly over the i-15 and went behind a mountain and dissappeared. also lights went slowly from red to white. when i first saw it i thought it was helicopters flying in formation at least five to 8 miles away, but when it got closer it was massive and moved silently and slowly. i was in utter disbelief. i still don't know what it was.
content.summary: Possibly saucer like, very black, 4 red lights, at least 0.2 miles long, approximately 150 to 100 feet,

content.detailedDescription:
On nov 11, 2010, at approximately 6:24pm (local time in maricopa, az) my brother in-law and i just pulled into my parking spot on the west side of my house. i exited my truck and was walking north, away from my truck when i see this row of red lights in the sky to the north by north east (nne). approximately 10 degrees in the sky.  the lights were all in a row and were blinking on and off like a strobe. they were in perfect alignment and it appeared to rotate around this object. this thing was huge!!! now comparing it to a full moon. it was five to six times bigger. 

at first i thought it was a bunch of planes coming into sky harbor, but they were all blinking red. which is unusual for plane inbound to phx. then i realized that they were in a perfect line and blinking in sequence. at that moment i put them together and realized this was one huge object.

at first it appeared to move east to west. and then north toward south mountain. but now that i reflect back on it, the object was flying by maricopa towards phoenix. i called my wife and parents out of the house to see this object. i also called my friend in mesa to look out and see if he saw it. my friend in mesa, said it was huge and was moving north. we all watched this object move over phoenix. traveling north from the eastern edge of south mountain, then over camelback mountain and then over toward cave creek. we watched this object until we could not see it any more over the horizon. it was visible for approximately 11 min total.
content.summary: Huge!!! red light object over phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
The sky was perfectly clear blue. i sat on the deck on the north side of the house, two blocks from lake erie. i noticed the oddest cloud formation: a narrow column of puffy white clouds rising straight up in an otherwise perfectly clear sky. i got neighbors on both sides of my house to witness. no one thought it was a normal occurence. these are reputable people in their 40's, 50's, 60's and 70's.

i called a local meteorologist *name deleted--cms/sg) with my information, and he returned my call the next day, saying he had no reports of the  occurence.

i described the formation to the meteoroligist as a volcanic eruption or atomic bomb (although it was a very columnar formation and obviously cloudlike).

it was not steam or smoke. it was not a waterspout.

the date i submitted as event date is very close to actual since one witness emailed me one or two days later with "cloaked ufos" info. he prefaced his email with "i hope you don't think this is too weird".
content.summary: Strange cloud formation originating on lake erie horizon

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were sitting outside at around 7 15 to 7 20 p.M. it is such a nice evening we decided to enjoy it by getting some fresh air and star gazing. we noticed a really bright star( looking due south)just above the tree line.The object changed from blue to green to white (slowly pulsing light changes )and moved up which would be north to east then to south.It would remain stationary for a few more moments.I said to my dad "oh my god" because of what we were witnessing, it  began to flash ( it would go bright before it moved ) and move west then back to where  it was originally due south.There was a shooting star/meteor at that time as well which was awesome! it then began to flash again and move. it did this for over twenty minutes. there were witnesses to this account. we thought it could have possibly been a satellite. but, not sure if a satellite would move that erratic.  the shape it kind of made was like a number 4.We had gotten the binoculars but could not get a good look at it. it would move as we tried to zoom in. we also live near a nuclear plant, so we know that there would have to have been some kind of no fly zone near especially over it. 
not sure what we were looking at but, it sure startled us. 
i had went inside the house to put get my cell phone so my daughter could call my husband and when we came  back outside the object was gone. total time elapsed 30 to 45 minutes.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Erratic moving sphere pulsing blue green white

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving in downtown olympia, wa, when i looked up and saw a very bright light, somewhat spherical in the sky -- it is hard to describe the exact shape.  the size seemed to big to be an airplane light but it could have been an airplane reflecting light??  as i passed some trees i lost sight of it, and when i got to a clearing it had disappeared. it was a very overcast day with very heavy, dark grey clouds and this object was very bright and stood out amongst the dark clouds.  it was almost like someone was flashing a large, bright light in the sky.

i saw it very briefly, maybe 15 seconds.  in that brief moment, it did not seem to move.  it just seemed such an odd sight, that i kept staring at it.  i'm posting in hopes someone else in the area saw it too.
content.summary: Very bright light against a very cloudy, overcast sky.

content.detailedDescription: My children and i had been at a bowling alley and when we walked out, i looked up into the night sky as i often do.  i saw a large orange pulsating light in the sky.  i asked my oldest child if she saw what i saw.  she didn't see it at first because she was already in our vehicle.  i made her get out of the vehicle so she could see it.  the other kids weren't interested in looking at it.  as soon as she looked up into the sky, she saw what i was talking about.  the object (shaped much like a candy corn standing up on the pointed end) stayed stationary for a minute or three while we observed it.  the object was pulsating an orange, orange-ish and white light.  it didn't blink as airplanes do, it pulsated.  there was never a time when it wasn't a color.  airplanes have a distinct blinking pattern that is easily recognizable and this was not that.  we both thought it was pretty neat, but neither of us could identify what it might be.  we watched it slowly start to move until it was out of our sight.  it didn't move quickly, just meandered out of our sight.  wondering if anybody else saw it or knows what it may have been?  i tried to get a picture on my cell phone, but my cell phone is no good at night shots.
content.summary: Pulsating orange object in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:48am est, travelling southwest on i70 past the indianapolis international airport.  (i drive this route 20+ times a week for work)  

the gps coordinates for the location were approx  39.42 n x 86.17 w   with a wide south/ southwest viewing area.

the sky was clear and near cloudless with the sun out of visual area.  the white ellipticle disk shaped object was hovering in the air, seemingly near the treeline.  there were no other objects nearby, as this is just outside the flight area for the airport.

i was not sure at first what it was. this did not resemble any planes or helicopters and was hovering in steady fashion. it was a flat white shapeless color, non reflective, unlike a plane which gleams in the sunlight.

it suddenly increased its elevation a great distance. then from a dead hovering stop, it moved latteraly to the left quite a distance, stopped, then shot straight up and out of sight.   the entire visual and movement experience lasted only 35 seconds.  
 
i was in disbelief at first, and spent the next 10 minutes watching the actions of the planes as they left the airport.  this object, while at a similar altitude of the banking planes, did not move as they did, nor did it leave a residual vapor trail.  the planes that i had watched took near 2 minutes to get out of visual range. unlike this object that took only 35 seconds to vanish.  

as the object shot straight up into the upper atmosphere, it took only seconds to be completely out of visual range.
 


as being the founder and lead investigator for mripa (midwestern researchers and investigators of paranormal activity)  i have spent the last 14 years researching and investigating phenomena.  for the last 3 years we have been working very closely with mufon indiana on joint efforts. (our credintials and information can be found at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg). 

we take great care and detail to ensure that as much information can be passed on to mufon as possible.

 
attached are a few pics of the area (taken ater in the day on my way back through).   i have *added* the respective motions and locations for a clearer visual with a black dot, even though the object was white.  the treeline is over a mile from the airport.   pov was open and clear with almost no clouds at all.  in respect to distance seen, i tried to make the dot as close to size viewed at each location.
content.summary: There and gone

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to make sure things were ok and to feed our cats, but i walked around to the north side of our house and noticed a yellow-white light off in the distance to the north, just above the horizon. it appeared to zig zag back and forth, then disappear in one spot, and then reappear in a different spot. about 5 minutes into this event, the object reappeared just above the treeline, this time instead of being a yellow-white color, it was red, it had no blinking lights at all, and since it was pretty far away, i couldn't hear any sound (except the sound of cars since we live next to highway 41), then it started to slowly descend, then i lost it behind the trees. i went inside to grab the camera, my cell phone, and our telescope, but i waited for probably an hour, and it never reappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb changing colors and zig zagging

content.detailedDescription: While driving east bound, up a short hill i had to lower my sun visor to block the sun as it was early morning and i was driving eastbound. i noticed the object in the sky to the left of the sun. at first i thought a small bit of bird [profanity deleted/cms/tg] was on my side glass. i double checked and there was nothing on my window. the object was the color of a white cloud but was shaped very differently. the bottom was squared off and the sides were straight. in the middle of the bottom there seemed to be a dark spot, i looked at this part of it more intensely to be sure. the top end kind of tapered off and had a wispyness to it. i stopped driving to take a closer look at it. the place where i stopped was next to a large tree. i was looking over my left shoulder to see the object. i kinda disregarded it after a while. almost took a cellphone pic of it but decided it was too far away to get anything decent. it was about 10 miles away. as i pulled away from where i stopped, the large tree blocked my view of the object. i looked again to where it should have been and it was gone. i then looked forward and there it was, still about 10 miles away but now it moved 90 degrees clockwise through the sky. that startled me. i kept driving on and soon lost sight of the object.
content.summary: In clear blue sky a white upright cylindrical object with a dark spot in the center of the bottom was noticed

content.detailedDescription:
On the 3rd of november, i observed slow moving, flashing lights high in the sky. these are the similar crafts that are rectangular in shape with the bright, flashing lights colored red and white! these lights however are not the lights you see on high flying airliners; they are much brighter and i have reported them in the past.

as i watched the lights moving it went behind the tall tree in my neighbors yard. the light went behind it at the tip of the tree but came out the other side near the bottom of the tree and was much closer to the ground at this point. i observed this craft moving northward towards the mountains and eventually into oregon if it were to stay on that path.

just when the lights were far enough away that i could still see the flashing lights but they were dimming because of trees and distance, it flashed brightly to where i actually pulled back and gasped because it felt like someone shot a bright light beam at me. this beam of light was felt in my left eye and not in my right eye. i say this because my left eye felt like it had looked at a welding light so i could feel the burn so to speak and slight discomfort. the weirdest part of this is that i saw or perceived an image ... a three pronged image; top and bottom with solid black in between. i had never seen this image that i can remember so i drew it so that i would not forget. some sort of ancient symbol of some sort is what i am getting out of this. . . and ancient alien symbol. i you go to http://ancientx.Com/nm/anmviewer.Asp?A=90 you'll see the three pronged symbol on the piece that was left behind as part of the debris from the roswell incident and crash. i was not aware of this until i searched for the symbol.

i felt unusually tired the next two days and my eye felt some trauma but no burn of any kind was left and has since healed from the discomfort.
content.summary: While observing slow moving lights to the north was zapped by beam with a symbol

content.detailedDescription: It was the day after hurracaine andrew. there were no city lights and had already turned dark. we were standing outside of the house which was a second floor balcony of a two story house.It was my mom, my dad, my brother, my husband at that time and myself. we saw lights coming from a corner in front of us, at first we thought it might be a helicopter, or a small plane,because it was in the air,but as it got closer it started to look like a train,big!But it was silent, it got closer, very close. we all saw it, it was amazing it was like a train full of coloroful lights suspended in mid air. its colors were red, blue and yellow,or green. some of the lights flashed,some where just moving. it was so close, there was no mistaking what we all saw. unfortonately we didnt see any articles in the papers about this apparence.We looked and searched but never found anything.I hope with your investigation you can give us some answers
content.summary: It was like a train full of colorful lights suspended in mid air

content.detailedDescription: I leave my blinds open about a foot and a half so the dog can go out .My sliding glass door and blinds . they look south to the oakland airport from alameda,  i am wondering have you heard of anything on nov 4 2010 around 9pm i saw what looked like bright falling star but it went straight down not sideways it had blues yellows and orange shooting out of the side as it fell i never saw anything like it, has anyone else seen it?  thankyou
content.summary: Not sure what it was

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of november 10, 2010 around ten pm, i was taking my dog out for her evening walk. it was an exceptionally clear night and the stars were amazing. as i looked up at them there was a super bright light, which i figured was venus or jupiter, and then i thought it was an airplane when i saw the blinking lights. the lights flashed blue and green in conjunction with thewhite light. while i stared at it it never moved, in fact it didnt move from the position it was in for a few hours. the other heavenly bodies moved as they should but this light did not move. i could see it from my living room window. this is not the first time that my family and i have seen these strange lights. they started appearing in 2006. same are but different parts of the sky, usualy the southern part of the sky or the souh western part. after i came in the house i told my mom to look at it just to make sure i wasnt seeing things. she alsosaw it and we had a discussion on what it could be while watching it from our living room window. we were both nervous but then curiousity took over and we just kept watching it. around 1` am i no longer noticed it in the sky/ i dont know where it went. the only movement it made while i was outside looking at it could have just been me moving but it wiggled a lil bit apart from that nothing for 2 hours or so. and my dog wanted back in that is all
content.summary: Bright green and blue flashy light

content.detailedDescription:
Was leaving a small neighborhood on the north side of hugo oklahoma. the area is open with no trees. heading south i saw a very bright object to the west-south-west, about 20 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be moving north, and was getting lower on the horizon as it moved. it moved from the approximate wsw position in the sky to a westerly position in about 20 seconds. the object was the shape of a skewed rectangle, about a third as high as it was long. it took up approximately an inch of sky at arms length. it was very bright, like a mirror shining in the sun, and did not put off a trail or sparks as with a meteor. 

i traveled at most 100 yards to the end of the road, and lost sight of it due to trees at the end of this road. i headed west toward home and attempted to catch sight of it again, but did not.
content.summary: Very bright, mirror like, skewed rectangle streaking across the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside and happen to notice a very bright star like object in the due eastern sky low on the horizon just over top of a ridge over the tree tops, it was a good distance away, but the colors flashing made me think it was an aircraft but it was stationary, and i knew it wasn't a star because no star or planet would be in that location and wasn't there next night.  in staring at the clear sky longer i noticed 5 more of these objects,these others were much higher up in the sky stretching westward, but if you drew a line connecting the dots so to speak you would have a hexagon.  so there were 6 of these in total.  each flashed the colors the same way and were visible to the naked eye. each was stationary in the sky that night.  as late as 11:30pm i was still seeing them before i finally went to sleep.  next night the 9th i did not see it anymore, none of them. tonight i am seeing 2 of them higher in the eastern sky, also clear night.
content.summary: In the eastern sky low on the horizon there was something star like but was flashing lots of colors and it was in a location where there are normally no stars, the colors were visible to naked eye and object stayed stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside my work on the east side of the building and saw a fast moving object in the sky coming from the northeast at a high rate of speed. it appeared to be at a high altitude. it made a series of turns towards the west. the turns themselves almost seemed angular. like maybe 15 degrees per turn. once it was heading almost due west it moved in a straight path until it got directly above me. at that point it stopped and remained stationary for 15 or 20 seconds and then either flew straight up very quickly or blipped out completely. it was gone in a matter of a second or two. after looking for it for a couple of minutes i went inside. about ten minutes later i came outside and saw it again, only this time it was at a much lower altitude. i'd say maybe 1000 feet. and it was i'd guess a mile north of me moving west fairly quickly. it was close enough that i could make out that it was solid and very reflective of the sunlight. and it was at least as big as a small airplane. i have always been an avid sky watcher and know the effects sunlight can have on birds, planes, balloons etc. this was nothing of the sort. 

p.S. just something else strange...When i lost sight of it the first time it blipped out or shot straight up, i had a dark spot on my vision where i was seeing the object before. not like when you look at a light and look away, this was a blacked out spot in my vision that lasted several minutes.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a fast moving white sphere come in from the ne and travel se then w.

content.detailedDescription: I am a 38 year old professional.I was driving up my parents hill for a visit and to give my dad his shots for medicine. when i got out of the car at 5:45 pm, i looked up and noticed a "star" that seemed to be larger than the other stars and it was flashing, or strobing red,green,yellow,and blue colors. the lights were thing was 100% stationary and seemed to be in one place or on one object?. there also seemed to be a fair amount of of recognizable air traffic...Port red and starboard green lights and white strobes on the planes and the planes move. the commercial aircraft was very high up....The lights were larger and higher up. it reminded us both of a super charged "simon" game, but far more active and sparkly. the lights or object remained stationary for over 4 hours and is actually still out there as i type. after showing it to my parents through the window, my mother went and retrieved my fathers high power binoculars. we both looked at the object while laying the binoculars on the car roof for stability. i can't even say what we both saw...It was like a large star...But strobing madly and didn't stop. it grew in intensity and pulsing frequency and then calmed a bit over and over. the "object" or lights were amazing and truly appeared to be "arcing" like welding does. as a matter of fact...It was similar to a multi colored welding flame that strobed as well yet seemed more electrical i guess. my mother stated she thought it looked like never ending fireworks but stationary and appeared to be the same altitude as the stars. this "thing" can't really be described in type. the flashes were so frequent it looked as though it was literally made of strobe lights in multi colors. my mother and i both thought it had an "aura" glow around it as well. my mother and i both called mufon, and the local colleges astronomy telescope observatory to tell them. i left and came home to type this. my mother just called at 8:45pm and said "through the binoculars it looks like it's well....It almost looks triangular now". "the red is on the middle it seems"..."it's so bright...There's red middle, and there are "creamy white lights" now near it and moving that can be seen in the binoculars only."it's the most amazing thing i've ever seen". "there are colors on what appear to be the corners" i am now calling my friends with telescopes. i do not have a camera yet recorded on my cell. the cell camera took video of blackness. i'm going to see if i can see anything on my laptop. we are 10% convinced it was not identifiable at all. it was no craft like anything either of us has ever seen. we are both very very blown away!
content.summary: Red,yellow,green, and blue flashing/twinkling/stationary large starlike?
